title: Static Websites
content:
Static Websites This section will walk you through hosting a static website on AWS.
We’ve tried not to make an assumtions so we’ll start with how to how a simple site in an S3 bucket and then walk you through to a more advanced CI/CD pipeline.

title: S3 Hosting
content: S3 Hosting Put your files into an S3 bucket named Domain.com and off you go.

title: Home
content:
AWS POWER TOOLS A home for DevOps professionals trying to make their life easier.
Goals  Provide simple examples to every day problems. Explain common problems so that you don’t have to learn the hard way Create structured learning paths Create a community of AWS experts
